name: Attack Boost
description: Increases attack power.

levels.description: Attack +3
Attack +5
Attack +7
Attack +2% Bonus: +8
Attack +4% Bonus: +9

name: Spread/Power Shots
description: Increases the attack of the bowgun's Spread Ammo and the bow's Power Shots and Quick Shots.

levels.description: Slightly increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.

name: Poison Functionality
description: Allows you to apply poison coatings.

levels.description: Lets you use poison coatings.

name: Para Functionality
description: Allows you to apply paralysis coatings.

levels.description: Lets you use paralysis coatings.

name: Special Ammo Boost
description: Increases the power of the bowgun's special ammo, and the bow's Dragon Piercer, Thousand Dragons, and Tracer.

levels.description: Moderately increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.
Increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.

name: Rapid Fire Up
description: Improves light bowgun rapid fire.

levels.description: Rapid fire damage +5%

name: Piercing Shots
description: Increases the attack of the bowgun's Pierce Ammo, and the bow's Dragon Piercer and Thousand Dragons.

levels.description: Slightly increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.

name: Normal Shots
description: Increases the attack power of Normal Ammo, normal arrows, and Flying Swallow Shot.

levels.description: Slightly increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.

name: Master's Touch
description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

levels.description: Grants an 80% chance of no sharpness loss while active.

name: Ballistics
description: Extends the range in which ammo and arrows have maximum power.

levels.description: Slightly extends range.
Extends range.
Greatly extends range.

name: Opening Shot
description: Increases the bowgun's reload speed and increases the power of bullets when fully loaded.

levels.description: Moderately increases bowgun reload speed and attack power of ammo when certain conditions are met.
Increases bowgun reload speed and attack power of ammo when certain conditions are met.
Greatly increases bowgun reload speed and attack power of ammo when certain conditions are met.

name: Bludgeoner
description: Increases attack power when your weapon sharpness is low.

levels.description: +5% attack power when your sharpness gauge is yellow or lower.
+10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is yellow or lower.
+10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is green or lower.

name: Mind's Eye
description: Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets.

levels.description: 50% chance of your attacks not being deflected, +10% damage to hard targets.
100% chance of your attacks not being deflected, +15% damage to hard targets.
100% chance of your attacks not being deflected, +30% damage to hard targets.

name: Protective Polish
description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

levels.description: Grants no sharpness loss for 30 seconds after activation.
Grants no sharpness loss for 60 seconds after activation.
Grants no sharpness loss for 90 seconds after activation.

name: Tetrad Shot
description: Increases affinity of bowgun ammo/ coatings from the fourth shot and attack of the fourth and sixth shots.

levels.description: Slightly increases the attack power and affinity of ammo after certain conditions are met.
Moderately increases attack power and affinity of ammo after certain conditions are met.
Increases the attack power and affinity of ammo after certain conditions are met.

name: Blossomdance Prayer
description: 2 → During Blossomdance, adds special items to quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

levels.description: During Blossomdance, adds special items to quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
During Blossomdance, adds special items to quest rewards, and greatly boosts attack and defense.

name: Razor Sharp
description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness.

levels.description: Grants a 10% chance of no sharpness loss.
Grants a 25% chance of no sharpness loss.
Grants a 50% chance of no sharpness loss.

name: Zoh Shia's Pulse
description: 2 → Allows the Health Gauge to continue to slowly recover up to the max value, even if there is no red portion.

levels.description: Allows the Health Gauge to continue to slowly recover up to the max value, even if there is no red portion.
Allows the Health Gauge to continue to recover up to the max value, even if there is no red portion.

name: Arkveld's Hunger
description: 2 → Regenerates a small amount of your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.

levels.description: Regenerates a small amount of your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.
Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.

name: Guardian Arkveld's Vitality
description: 2 → Restores a moderate amount of health when destroying a wound on a large monster.

levels.description: Restores a moderate amount of health when destroying a wound on a large monster.
Restores health when destroying a wound on a large monster.

name: Gore Magala's Tyranny
description: 2 → Infects you with Frenzy when against large monsters.

levels.description: Infects you with Frenzy when against large monsters.
Infects you with Frenzy and raises attack when against large monsters. Attack power increases upon recovery.

name: Mizutsune's Prowess
description: 2 → Prevents major bubbleblight and increases evasion while afflicted with minor bubbleblight.

levels.description: Prevents major bubbleblight and increases evasion while afflicted with minor bubbleblight.
Prevents major bubbleblight and ups evasion while afflicted. Trigger minor bubbleblight by evading many times.

name: Jin Dahaad's Revolt
description: 2 → Increases attack after recovering from webbed status, frostblight, being pinned, or a Power Clash.

levels.description: Increases attack after recovering from webbed status, frostblight, being pinned, or a Power Clash.
Greatly increases attack after recovering from webbed status, frostblight, being pinned, or a Power Clash.

name: Nu Udra's Mutiny
description: 2 → Deals moderate additional damage while the Resentment skill is active.

levels.description: Deals moderate additional damage while the Resentment skill is active.
Deals additional damage while the Resentment skill is active.

name: Rey Dau's Voltage
description: 2 → Moderately extends the activation time of the Latent Power skill.

levels.description: Moderately extends the activation time of the Latent Power skill.
Extends the activation time of the Latent Power skill.

name: Uth Duna's Cover
description: 2 → Increases defense temporarily when using a specialized tool.

levels.description: Increases defense temporarily when using a specialized tool.
Greatly increases defense and resistance temporarily when using a specialized tool.

name: Fulgur Anjanath's Will
description: 2 → Grants an additional Stamina Gauge.

levels.description: Grants an additional Stamina Gauge.
Grants an additional long Stamina Gauge.

name: Ebony Odogaron's Power
description: 2 → Extends the duration of the Burst skill and grants attack +3 while Burst is active.

levels.description: Extends the duration of the Burst skill and grants attack +3 while Burst is active.
Further extends the duration of the Burst skill and grants attack +10 while Burst is active.

name: Blangonga's Spirit
description: 2 → Using the To Victory! gesture moderately  increases attack temporarily to nearby allies. Greatly effects Palicoes and Support Hunters.

levels.description: Using the To Victory! gesture moderately  increases attack temporarily to nearby allies. Greatly effects Palicoes and Support Hunters.
Using the To Victory! gesture increases attack temporarily to nearby allies. Greatly effects Palicoes and Support Hunters.

name: Gravios's Protection
description: 2 → Reduces the damage you take by 5% when your health is full.

levels.description: Reduces the damage you take by 5% when your health is full.
Reduces the damage you take by 10% when your health is full.

name: Xu Wu's Vigor
description: 2 → Temporarily grants attack +15 after eating items such as well-done steak.

levels.description: Temporarily grants attack +15 after eating items such as well-done steak.
Temporarily grants attack +25 after eating items such as well-done steak.

name: Rathalos's Flare
description: 2 → Chance to deal additional fire damage after landing an attack.

levels.description: Chance to deal additional fire damage after landing an attack.
Increases additional fire damage after landing an attack.

name: Doshaguma's Might
description: 2 → Temporarily grants attack +10 after a successful Power Clash or Offset attack

levels.description: Temporarily grants attack +10 after a successful Power Clash or Offset attack
Temporarily grants attack +25 after a successful Power Clash or Offset attack

name: Glory's Favor
description: 3 → Increases quest target rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

levels.description: Increases quest target rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

name: Festival Spirit
description: 3 → Lets you carve one additional time from carcasses during quests. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

levels.description: Lets you carve one additional time from carcasses during quests. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

name: Lord's Soul
description: 3 → Boosts attack and lowers defense but lets you survive one lethal hit. Afterwards, boosts defense and res.

levels.description: Boosts attack and lowers defense but lets you survive one lethal hit. Afterwards, boosts defense and res.

name: Lord's Favor
description: 3 → Temporarily increases attack power when using effects like Melody Effects that affect companions in range.

levels.description: Temporarily increases attack power when using effects like Melody Effects that affect companions in range.

name: Lord's Fury
description: 3 → Increases attack when inflicted with ailments.

levels.description: Increases attack when inflicted with ailments.

name: Imparted Wisdom
description: 3 → Increases the chance of finding rare gathering points.

levels.description: Increases the chance of finding rare gathering points.

name: Guardian's Protection
description: 3 → Reduces elemental and unique damage while in the Ruins of Wyveria.

levels.description: Reduces elemental and unique damage while in the Ruins of Wyveria.

name: Guardian's Pulse
description: 3 → Increases recovery speed of stamina and red gauge when near Wylkrystals.

levels.description: Increases recovery speed of stamina and red gauge when near Wylkrystals.

name: Alluring Pelt
description: 3 → Increases the attention drawn to you when attacking a monster.

levels.description: Increases the attention drawn to you when attacking a monster.

name: Buttery Leathercraft
description: 3 → Increases your affinity temporarily when sliding on terrain.

levels.description: Increases your affinity temporarily when sliding on terrain.

name: Flexible Leathercraft
description: 3 → Increases gathering speed, and prevents knock back when gathering or carving.

levels.description: Increases gathering speed, and prevents knock back when gathering or carving.

name: Scale Layering
description: 3 → Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.

levels.description: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.

name: Fortifying Pelt
description: 3 → Increases attack and defense after fainting during a quest. (Can be used twice.)

levels.description: Increases attack and defense after fainting during a quest. (Can be used twice.)

name: Scaling Prowess
description: 3 → Makes it easier to mount monsters and to wound them once mounted.

levels.description: Makes it easier to mount monsters and to wound them once mounted.

name: Neopteron Camouflage
description: 3 → Increases movement speed while crouching, and makes it easier to escape large monsters' detection.

levels.description: Increases movement speed while crouching, and makes it easier to escape large monsters' detection.

name: Neopteron Alert
description: 3 → Increases the amount of honey you gain from gathering points.

levels.description: Increases the amount of honey you gain from gathering points.

name: Outdoorsman
description: Improves fishing, grilling, and transporting abilities.

levels.description: Improves fishing, grilling, and transporting abilities.

name: Entomologist
description: The bodies of small insect monsters won't be destroyed, allowing them to be carved.

levels.description: Activates skill effect.

name: Geologist
description: Increases the number of items you gain at gathering points.

levels.description: One extra item when gathering from bonepiles.
Additionally adds one extra item when gathering special items.
Additionally adds one extra item when gathering from mining outcrops.

name: Blindsider
description: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.

levels.description: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.

name: Botanist
description: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.

levels.description: One extra consumable herb item per gather.
Additionally adds one extra consumable fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
Additionally adds one extra consumable insect item per gather.
Additionally adds one extra consumable mushroom item per gather.

name: Item Prolonger
description: Extends the duration of some item effects.

levels.description: Item effect duration +10%
Item effect duration +25%
Item effect duration +50%

name: Free Meal
description: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.

levels.description: Activates 10% of the time.
Activates 25% of the time.
Activates 45% of the time.

name: Bombardier
description: Increases the damage of explosive items.

levels.description: Explosive power +10%
Explosive power +20%
Explosive power +30%

name: Mushroomancer
description: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.

levels.description: Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.
Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.
Additionally lets you digest mandragoras, devil's blight, and exciteshrooms.

name: Tool Specialist
description: Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.

levels.description: Shortens recharge time by 10%.
Shortens recharge time by 20%.
Shortens recharge time by 30%.
Shortens recharge time by 40%.
Shortens recharge time by 50%.

name: Wide-Range
description: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.

levels.description: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with full efficacy.

name: Cliffhanger
description: Decreases stamina depletion when climbing on vines.

levels.description: Reduces stamina depletion while climbing by 50%.

name: Jump Master
description: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.

levels.description: Negates knockback during jumps.

name: Leap of Faith
description: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters and extends the dive-evade distance.

levels.description: Enables skill use.

name: Shock Absorber
description: Disables damage reactions when you hit a friend or when a friend hits you.

levels.description: Activates skill effect.

name: Aquatic/Oilsilt Mobility
description: Grants resistance against impairments to mobility while in water, oilsilt, or streams.

levels.description: Negates the effects of muddy streams, and prevents you from being slowed down in water or oilsilt.
Also negates the effects of waves.

name: Speed Eating
description: Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.

levels.description: Moderately increases eating speed.
Increases eating speed.
Greatly increases eating speed.

name: Intimidator
description: Reduces the chance small monsters will attack after spotting you. (Has no effect on certain monsters.)

levels.description: Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

name: Windproof
description: Grants protection against wind pressure.

levels.description: Negates minor wind pressure and halves the effects of major wind pressure.
Negates minor and major wind pressure and halves the effects of dragon wind pressure.
Negates all kinds of wind pressure.

name: Flinch Free
description: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.

levels.description: Prevents knockbacks.
Prevents knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.
Prevents knockbacks and tripping.

name: Tremor Resistance
description: Grants protection against ground tremors.

levels.description: Nullifies very minor ground tremors and halves effects of minor ground tremors.
Nullifies up to minor ground tremors and greatly reduces the effects of major ground tremors.
Nullifies all ground tremors.

name: Quick Sheathe
description: Speeds up weapon sheathing.

levels.description: Slightly increases sheathing speed.
Increases sheathing speed.
Greatly increases sheathing speed.

name: Earplugs
description: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.

levels.description: Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.

name: Evade Extender
description: Increases evade distance.

levels.description: Slightly extends evasion distance.
Extends evasion distance.
Greatly extends evasion distance.

name: Evade Window
description: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

levels.description: Very slightly increases invulnerability window.
Slightly increases invulnerability window.
Increases invulnerability window.
Greatly increases invulnerability window.
Massively increases invulnerability window.

name: Self-Improvement
description: Attack and defense increase as time passes while on a quest. (The maximum is reached after 30 minutes.)

levels.description: Activates skill effect.

name: Elemental Absorption
description: After taking elemental damage, temporarily grants you element effects. (Cooldown after effect ends)

levels.description: While active, slightly increases elemental attack, and resistance to element taken at activation by 4.
While active, moderately increases elemental attack, and resistance to element taken at activation by 6.
While active, increases elemental attack, and resistance to element taken at activation by 8.

name: Antivirus
description: Once infected, makes it easier to overcome the Frenzy and increases affinity if cured.

levels.description: Slightly increases recovery rate after contracting the Frenzy. Affinity +3% if cured.
Increases recovery rate after contracting the Frenzy. Affinity +6% if cured.
Greatly increases recovery rate after contracting the Frenzy. Affinity +15% if cured.

name: Ambush
description: Temporarily increases damage to large monsters with a successful Sneak Attack.

levels.description: Attack +5% while active.
Attack +10% while active.
Attack +15% while active.

name: Partbreaker
description: Makes it easier to break large monster parts, and increases damage dealt when destroying a wound with a Focus Strike.

levels.description: Increases part damage and damage dealt when conditions are met by 10%.
Increases part damage and damage dealt when conditions are met by 20%.
Increases part damage and damage dealt when conditions are met by 30%.

name: Coalescence
description: Temporarily increases elemental attack power and status effects after recovering from blights or abnormal status.

levels.description: When active, grants a slight increase to elemental damage and status buildup.
When active, grants an increase to elemental damage and status buildup.
When active, grants a large increase to elemental damage and status buildup.

name: Palico Rally
description: Powers up Palicoes.

levels.description: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 5%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 10%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 15%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 20%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 25%.

name: Foray
description: Increases attack power and affinity against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.

levels.description: Attack +6 against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.
Attack +8 and affinity +5% against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.
Attack +10 and affinity +10% against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.
Attack +12 and affinity +15% against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.
Attack +15 and affinity +20% against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.

name: Latent Power
description: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.

levels.description: While active, affinity +10% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, affinity +20% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, affinity +30% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
While active, affinity +40% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
While active, affinity +50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Flayer
description: Makes it easier to inflict wounds. Upon inflicting enough damage, also deals additional non-elemental damage.

levels.description: Makes it ever so slightly easier to inflict wounds. Also deals additional non-elemental damage.
Makes it moderately easier to inflict wounds. Also deals slightly more additional non-elemental damage.
Makes it easier to inflict wounds. Also deals moderately more additional non-elemental damage.
Makes it much easier to inflict wounds. Also deals more additional non-elemental damage.
Makes it significantly easier to inflict wounds. Also deals much more additional non-elemental damage.

name: Burst
description: Continuously landing hits gradually increases attack and elemental attack. (Amount increased depends on weapon.)

levels.description: On first hit, gain a small temporary attack and element boost, replaced by a larger boost after the fifth hit.
Hit 5 successive times for a moderate stat boost.
Hit 5 successive times for a bigger stat boost.
Hit 5 successive times for an even bigger stat boost.
Hit 5 successive times for a huge stat boost.

name: Heroics
description: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.

levels.description: Defense +50 while active.
Attack +5% and defense +50 while active.
Attack +5% and defense +100 while active.
Attack +10% and defense +100 while active.
Attack +30% and defense-increasing effects are negated while active.

name: Agitator
description: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.

levels.description: Attack +4 and affinity +3% while active.
Attack +8 and affinity +5% while active.
Attack +12 and affinity +7% while active.
Attack +16 and affinity +10% while active.
Attack +20 and affinity +15% while active.

name: Marathon Runner
description: Slows down stamina depletion for actions that continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).

levels.description: Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 15%.
Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 30%.
Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Hunger Resistance
description: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.

levels.description: Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 50%.
Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 100%.
Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

name: Stamina Surge
description: Speeds up stamina recovery.

levels.description: Stamina recovery speed +10%
Stamina recovery speed +30%
Stamina recovery speed +50%

name: Constitution
description: Reduces stamina depletion when evading, blocking, or doing certain other actions.

levels.description: Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 10%.
Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 20%.
Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 30%.
Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 40%.
Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Survival Expert
description: Extra health is recovered from environmental interactables.

levels.description: Restores 50 health.
Restores 80 health.
Restores 100 health.

name: Recovery Speed

levels.description: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

name: Recovery Up
description: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.

levels.description: Slightly increases recovery.

Greatly increases recovery.

name: Adaptability
description: Grants protection against environmental damage, such as from heat or cold.

levels.description: Negates the effects of heat and cold.
Negates environmental damage.

name: Bind Resistance
description: Grants protection against webbed status and frostblight.

levels.description: Allows you to quickly recover from webbed status or frostblight.

levels.description: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.

levels.description: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%.

levels.description: Reduces the duration of defense down by 50%.
Reduces the duration of defense down by 75%.

name: Paralysis Resistance
description: Reduces the duration of paralysis.

levels.description: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.
Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.
Prevents paralysis.

name: Poison Resistance
description: Reduces damage while poisoned.

levels.description: Reduces the number of times you take poison damage.
Greatly reduces the number of times you take poison damage.
Prevents poison.

name: Sleep Resistance
description: Reduces the duration of sleep.

levels.description: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.
Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.
Prevents sleep.

levels.description: Attack +10 while active.
Attack +15 while active. Moderately extends effect time.

description: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed evade just as a monster attacks.

levels.description: Attack +10 while active.
Attack +15 while active.

description: Increases attack when your health is full.

levels.description: Attack +3 while active.
Attack +6 while active.
Attack +10 while active.

description: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your Health Gauge).

levels.description: Attack +5 while active.
Attack +10 while active.

Attack +25 while active.

name: Whiteflame Torrent
description: Chance to deal additional damage after landing an attack.

levels.description: Activates skill effect. (When used with Scorcher, does not stack but adds extra fire damage.)

name: Slicked Blade
description: Temporarily increases affinity when wet or when inflicted with bubbleblight. (Wet and bubbleblight effects stack.)

levels.description: Affinity +3% when wet, and +7% while afflicted with bubbleblight.
Affinity +6% when wet, and +14% while afflicted with bubbleblight.

description: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.

levels.description: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.

name: Load Shells
description: Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.

levels.description: Increases shell and phial reloading speed.
Increases shell/phial reloading speed. Gunlance loading capacity +1. Charge blade charges 5 phials on yellow gauge.

name: Guard Up
description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

levels.description: Reduces damage taken by 30%.
Reduces damage taken by 50%.
Reduces damage taken by 80%.

name: Guard
description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

levels.description: Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Airborne
description: Increases the damage caused by jumping attacks.

levels.description: Jumping attack power +10%

name: Poison Duration Up
description: Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.

levels.description: Extends the duration of your poison's effect by 20%.

name: Charge Up
description: Increases your power to induce stun when you hit a monster with a hammer's charged attack.

levels.description: Activates skill effect.

name: Artillery
description: Strengthens explosive attacks like shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and Sticky Ammo.

levels.description: Moderately increases each attack and Wyvern's Fire firing speed. Shelling fire attack +30.
Increases each attack and Wyvern's Fire firing speed. Shelling fire attack +60.
Greatly increases each attack and Wyvern's Fire firing speed. Shelling fire attack +90.

name: Horn Maestro
description: Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies. (Effect lost when you change weapons.)

levels.description: Extends Melody Effect duration and increases the chance of larger heals from healing melodies.
Greatly increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.

name: Rapid Morph
description: Increases switch speed and power for switch axes and charge blades.

levels.description: Speed +10%
Speed +20% Morph attack damage +10%
Speed +30% Morph attack damage +20%

name: Stamina Thief
description: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.

levels.description: Exhaust power +20%
Exhaust power +30%
Exhaust power +40%

name: Punishing Draw
description: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power. (Not effective while riding.)

levels.description: Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and gain attack +3.
Draw attacks deal a medium amount of stun damage and gain attack +5.
Draw attacks deal a large amount of stun damage and gain attack +7.

name: Slugger
description: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

levels.description: Stun power +20%
Stun power +30%
Stun power +40%

name: Power Prolonger
description: Allows long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades to stay powered up longer.

levels.description: Moderately boosts the duration weapons are powered up.
Boosts the duration weapons are powered up.
Greatly boosts the duration weapons are powered up.

name: Exhaust Functionality
description: Allows you to apply exhaust coatings.

levels.description: Lets you use exhaust coatings.

name: Blast Functionality
description: Allows you to apply blast coatings.

levels.description: Lets you use blast coatings.

name: Handicraft
description: Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.

levels.description: Weapon sharpness +10
Weapon sharpness +20

Weapon sharpness +50

name: Focus
description: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.

levels.description: Slightly increases gauge fill rate and reduces charge times by 5%.
Moderately increases gauge fill rate and reduces charge times by 10%.
Increases gauge fill rate and reduces charge times by 15%.

name: Sleep Functionality
description: Allows you to apply sleep coatings.

levels.description: Lets you use sleep coatings.

name: Critical Status
description: Increases abnormal status effects (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.

levels.description: Slightly increases abnormal status effects when landing critical hits.
Increases abnormal status effects when landing critical hits.
Greatly increases abnormal status effects when landing critical hits.

description: Increases element power and status buildup for charged attacks.
